action_points.description: Implement a comprehensive AI-driven cybersecurity solution to enhance detection and defense mechanisms against advanced AI-driven phishing and other sophisticated cyber threats.

Establish a specialized task force to focus on the security and resilience of critical infrastructure, especially in high-risk sectors such as healthcare and government, to develop and enforce stringent security measures and response plans.
Initiate a program to systematically update and secure both new and legacy systems to protect against emerging vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with current cybersecurity standards.
